mapper.insert: insert into KRC_ORDER_HISTORY (company_id, company_name, order_name, phone_no, item, count, order_date, current_status) value('10460', '파이어독스', #{register_name}, #{phone_no}, 'FD-M538', 1, now(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT order_seq, base_seq, item, contents, reg_id, reg_date FROM TBL_ORDER where use_yn = 'Y' order by reg_date DESC
SELECT order_seq, base_seq, item, contents, reg_id, reg_date FROM TBL_ORDER where order_seq = #{order_seq}
SELECT order_his_seq, order_seq, company_id, company_name, phone_no, item, cnt, reg_id, reg_date FROM TBL_ORDER_HISTORY ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT job_no, CASE WHEN job_type = 'I' THEN '구인' ELSE '구직' END AS job_type, job_user_id, job_title, job_memo, job_hit, job_reg_date, job_reg_id FROM TBL_JOB WHERE job_use_yn = 'Y'
AND job_type = 'I' AND job_type = 'S' ORDER BY job_reg_date DESC

SELECT deal_no, CASE WHEN deal_type = 'S' THEN '팝니다' ELSE '삽니다' END AS deal_type, deal_user_id, deal_title, deal_memo, deal_hit, deal_reg_id, deal_reg_date FROM TBL_DEAL WHERE deal_use_yn = 'Y'
AND deal_type = 'S' AND deal_type = 'B' ORDER BY deal_reg_date DESC
SELECT initial_no, initial_title, initial_memo, initial_hit, initial_reg_id, initial_reg_date FROM TBL_LPG_INITIAL WHERE initial_use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY initial_reg_date DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN gas_cat = 'a3' OR gas_cat = 'a4' OR gas_cat = 'a5' THEN 'LPG용기' ELSE '특정 설비' END AS gas_cat, gas_title, gas_memo, gas_hit, gas_reg_id, gas_reg_date FROM TBL_GAS_REL WHERE gas_use_yn = 'Y'
AND (gas_cat != 'a3' AND gas_cat != 'a4' AND gas_cat != 'a5') AND (gas_cat = 'a3' OR gas_cat = 'a4' OR gas_cat = 'a5')
ORDER BY gas_no DESC
SELECT gas_no, gas_cat, gas_title, gas_memo, gas_hit, gas_reg_id, gas_reg_date FROM TBL_GAS_REL WHERE gas_use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY gas_reg_date DESC
